name: Spooky (pello)
description:
Jack needs some coins to continue drinking. Help him find some in the house. But wait,... did he trap the Devil inside his own house? He may be very pissed!

Use ARROW keys to move. Get the keys and open the door to go to the next room.

Try to collect coins on your way out. Beware of the ghosts, and get some beer to recover yourself. Don't panic if the lights go out. You should be able to reach the door... if you remember where it was. If it's too dark, you can wait until a lightning comes to the rescue.
